function_call.name: classify_risks_PESTLE
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Transmission of infectious agents not solely correlated with the size of the microbes in droplet nuclei or larger droplets","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Pathogen-laden droplets expelled during medical procedures may travel further and reach deeper into the respiratory tract of susceptible persons","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Airborne transmission of infectious agents","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inactivation of mycobacterium tuberculosis by uvgi systems","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Highly drug-resistant strains of m tuberculosis reported in several countries","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Insufficient evidence on the actual performance of uvgi systems in hospital rooms","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Limited practical application of uvgi in health care buildings","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Gaps in existing evidence regarding design and operational factors impacting the efficacy of uvgi systems","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inadequate prediction of outbreak","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inaccurate detection and diagnosis of infected patients","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Insufficient anticipation of critical cases","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Reliance on information from news articles to understand the use of data analytics in global emergency situations","category":"Social risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Focus on country-specific measures may lead to omission of instances where other governments and organizations utilize big data technologies in pandemics","category":"Social risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inaccurate detection of covid-19 through chest x-ray or ct image analysis","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Privacy concerns related to contact tracing applications and data exchange","category":"Data Privacy and Security risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Cybersecurity risks to healthcare data and covid-19 research organizations","category":"Data Privacy and Security risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of cross-system interoperability in healthcare","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Inadequate data exchange due to legal issues, limited financial support, and international communication challenges","category":"Legal risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Poor quality and incomplete healthcare data impacting response to pandemic","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of historical data for new virus transmission, incubation period, and immunity duration.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Challenges in utilizing big data analytics for covid-19 due to limited evidence and data.","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Utilization of cough sound analysis tool for identifying potential patients","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Deployment of covid-19 bus equipped with ai tools for screening based on x-ray analysis","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Use of ai solutions in healthcare without proper validation and oversight","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Insufficient data privacy and security measures in covid-19 tracking apps","category":"Data Privacy and Security risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Potential for over-reliance on ai and automation for public safety and crowd monitoring","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Use of big data analytics may lead to over-reliance on technology and neglect of human input in decision-making.","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Monitoring compliance using ai and internet-connected devices may infringe on privacy rights and civil liberties of citizens.","category":"Data Privacy and Security risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Deployment of predictive analytics for identifying severity of disease and patient triage","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Use of centralized database for coronavirus research","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Use of location and proximity data for contact tracing","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Use of cellphone location data for contact tracing","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Reliance on social media and public data for disease trend analysis presents a risk of inaccurate or biased data leading to incorrect alerts and responses.","category":"Social risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Privacy and data security risks associated with contact tracing apps and ai-powered video analytics tools, as they collect and process sensitive personal information.","category":"Data Privacy and Security risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Health data collection from fitness trackers and vital signs monitoring raises concerns about data accuracy, reliability, and potential misuse.","category":"Data Privacy and Security risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Use of ai-based tools for triaging and managing covid-19 patients","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Collection and utilization of anonymous user movement data for contact risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Remote monitoring of covid-19 patients","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Prediction and tracking of virus spread based on location data","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Use of ai to assess and predict disease transmission","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Use of cognitive computing and ai for covid-19 diagnosis","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Data mining and analytics for covid-19 research","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Graph analytics for identifying relationships in scientific publications","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Consolidation of biomedical data for predictive drug combination therapies","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Potential transmission of contagious diseases due to inadequate surveillance and control measures","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Privacy concerns and ethical implications of using big data and location tracking","category":"Data Privacy and temperature scanners in railway stations and subways","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Ambiguity and lack of understanding about the virus strain, behavior, and
